alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 26 at 8:07AM MDT until July 26 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES WILL CREATE CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS THIS AFTERNOON AND EVENING... .Dry southwest flow aloft will result in another round of gusty west to southwest winds this afternoon and early evening with very low relative humidity. The strongest winds and lowest humidities will be near the Nevada border. The dry and windy combination will result in critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... * WINDS...West to southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...6 to 15 percent. * PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
